U6-U8.description: Focus on fundamental skills, fun activities, and basic spatial awareness

plays.name: Individual Dribble Attack
plays.description: Players focus on individual ball control and dribbling towards goal
keyPoints: Encourage every player to dribble with the ball
Eyes on the ball while moving forward
Use inside and outside of foot
Simple 'get the ball and go' mentality
plays.tactics: No structured positions - encourage aggressive dribbling and shooting whenever possible
plays.visual: Players spread across field with freedom to move

plays.name: Spread Out and Space
plays.description: Teaching basic spacing to prevent bunching
keyPoints: Find empty space on the field
Use visual cues like cones for zones
plays.tactics: Use 'stay in your home' analogy - each player has a zone to patrol
plays.visual: Field divided into 6 zones with players assigned

plays.name: Quick Shoot on Goal
plays.description: Encourage immediate shooting when near goal
keyPoints: Shoot as soon as you're near the goal
Power doesn't matter - accuracy comes later
plays.tactics: Reward any shot on goal, build confidence through attempts
plays.visual: Players encouraged to shoot from anywhere in attacking third

plays.name: Goal Kick Spread
plays.description: Simple positioning for goal kicks
keyPoints: Players spread to sides of field
Kick to open space or strong dribbler
plays.tactics: Get ball to player with space, avoid kicking to crowded areas
plays.visual: Players positioned on wings and sides

plays.name: Protect the Goal
plays.description: Basic defending concept - stay between ball and goal
keyPoints: Stay between ball and your goal
Try to take the ball away
plays.tactics: Simple 'protect your goal' mindset without complex marking
plays.visual: Defenders facing ball, positioned between ball and goal

U10.description: Introducing basic tactics, positions, and team coordination

plays.name: Wing Attack with Cross
plays.description: Use wide players to create crossing opportunities
keyPoints: Look for runners in the box
Cross low and hard or lofted to back post
plays.tactics: Stretch defense horizontally, create 2v1 situations on wings, forwards time runs into box
plays.visual: Winger runs down sideline, forwards make diagonal runs into box

plays.name: Triangle Passing Play
plays.description: Create triangles for passing support
keyPoints: Pass and move to new position
plays.tactics: Maintain possession through short passes, move ball from defense to attack through connected triangles
plays.visual: Three players forming triangle shape for passing options

plays.name: Quick Counter Attack
plays.description: Win ball and attack quickly with fast players
keyPoints: Win the ball in defensive half
One quick pass forward to fast player
plays.tactics: Defend deep, win ball, immediate forward pass, exploit speed advantage
plays.visual: Defender wins ball, passes to fast forward who runs at goal

plays.name: Corner Kick - Near Post Run
plays.description: Organized corner kick targeting near post
keyPoints: Two runners - one near post, one far post
Near post runner times run to arrive as ball comes
Flick on to far post or shoot directly
plays.tactics: In-swinging corner to near post, runner flicks toward goal or far post, teammates follow up
plays.visual: Corner taker delivers to near post, runner makes angled run

plays.name: Pressure and Cover Defense
plays.description: First defender pressures, second defender covers
keyPoints: Closest player pressures ball carrier immediately
Next closest player provides cover behind
Communicate 'I got ball' and 'I got cover'
plays.tactics: First defender closes down space, second defender prevents through balls, compact defensive shape
plays.visual: First defender presses ball, second defender positioned at angle behind

U12.description: More complex tactics with defined roles and coordinated team movements

plays.name: Build Up from Back
plays.description: Organized progression from defense to attack
keyPoints: Short passes through thirds of field
plays.tactics: Progress through defensive, middle, and attacking thirds with controlled possession, switch sides when congested
plays.visual: Ball moves from back through midfield with supporting runs

plays.name: Overlapping Fullback Attack
plays.description: Fullback overlaps winger to create overload
keyPoints: Fullback sprints from behind to overlap
Winger can pass to overlapping runner or cut inside
plays.tactics: Use overlapping runs to create numerical advantage on wings, winger decides to pass or dribble based on defender position
plays.visual: Fullback runs outside and ahead of winger creating passing option

plays.name: Central Midfield Overload
plays.description: Dominate center of field with numerical advantage
keyPoints: Draw opponents to center then switch wide
plays.tactics: Control game through midfield dominance, tire opponents with possession, create space on wings by drawing players central
plays.visual: Multiple midfielders in close proximity passing quickly

plays.name: Free Kick Wall Pass
plays.description: Quick free kick using wall pass to bypass defense
plays.tactics: Catch defense off guard with quick restart, use wall pass to bypass defensive wall, create shooting angle
plays.visual: Two attackers exchange quick passes to break defensive setup

plays.name: High Defensive Press
plays.description: Press opponents high up the field to win ball in attacking areas
keyPoints: Midfielders step up to cut passing lanes
Compact team shape - small distances between lines
plays.tactics: Aggressive pressing to force turnovers, transition quickly to attack after winning ball, requires high fitness and discipline
plays.visual: Entire team pushes high, pressuring opponent in their defensive third

U14+.description: Advanced tactics requiring tactical intelligence and sophisticated execution

plays.name: False 9 Movement
plays.description: Striker drops deep to create space for midfielders to run into
keyPoints: Pulls center backs out of position
Midfielders make runs into vacated space
plays.tactics: Disrupt opponent defensive organization, create space behind defense, midfielders must recognize and exploit space
plays.visual: Striker drops deep, center backs follow, midfielders run into space behind

plays.name: Inverted Wingers Cutting Inside
plays.description: Wingers on opposite foot side cut inside for shooting
keyPoints: Left footed player on right wing (and vice versa)
Shoot from edge of box or pass to striker
plays.tactics: Use inverted wingers to create shooting opportunities from wide positions, overload central areas, unpredictable movement
plays.visual: Winger receives ball wide, cuts inside onto strong foot toward goal

plays.name: Tiki-Taka Possession
plays.description: Rapid short passing to maintain possession and tire opponents
plays.tactics: Dominate possession through quick passing, force opponents to chase, create openings through patient buildup
plays.visual: Players in tight spaces exchanging rapid short passes

plays.name: Advanced Corner Routine
plays.description: Coordinated corner kick with multiple decoy runs
keyPoints: Short corner option to draw defenders
Three runners - near post, middle, far post
Blocker creates space for key runner
Variable delivery - in-swing, out-swing, or low driven
plays.tactics: Create confusion with movement, use blocking runs to free up key attacker, practice multiple variations
plays.visual: Multiple coordinated runs with one player blocking defenders

plays.name: Defensive Offside Trap
plays.description: Coordinated defensive line pushes up to catch opponents offside
keyPoints: Entire defensive line steps up together
Trigger: opponent looks to make through pass
plays.tactics: Catch opponent strikers offside during buildup, requires excellent communication and timing, compress field
plays.visual: Defensive line steps up simultaneously as pass is played
